title: And To The Stars I Went With Only A Name Hub
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:bedrock]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:lumina]]

[[module css]]
:root {
    --header-title: 'The Seven Colonies';
    --header-subtitle: 'Of The Second Hytoth';

    --lumina-header-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/and-to-the-stars-i-went-with-only-a-name-hub/sirius.png);
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:ratio-bar base=--|ex=--]]

=====
[[include component:preview
text=
They won't be the last species to venture into the great unknown. But they certainly weren't the first.
]]
=====


[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div style="text-align: right; margin-top: -20px;"]]

by [[[mastertman2-s-menagerie| MasterTman2]]]

[[/div]]


[[div class="filebox"]]
On July 30, 1955, the United States and the Soviet Union began their race to the stars.
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
The two nations competed over the next few decades to see who would get further into space more quickly.
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
They won't be the last species to venture into the great unknown.
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
But they certainly weren't the first.
[[/div]]

+ WORKS

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]][[[from-the-sky|From The Sky]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user Ethagon]][[/size]]
//For an historian, space is thankfully the much more preserving medium.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]] [[[flying-whales|Flying Whales]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user MasterTman2]][[/size]]
//I doubt help will come, but that's okay. Because a captain always goes down with his ship.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]][[[in-the-wilderness|In The Wilderness]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user Kothardarastrix]][[/size]]
//Or, perhaps, it is simply because names have power.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]][[[where-dragons-dwell|Where Dragons Dwell (Mindversion)]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user Ethagon]][[/size]]
//Why tie my heart to your abominable might if thou cannot cleanse me of this disease.//
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]][[[the-heaviest-matter-of-the-universe|The Heaviest Matter Of The Universe]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user Kothardarastrix]][[/size]]
//From Hell's heart I stab at thee!//
[[/div]]

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]] [[[SCP-8851|VNP-8851: To Sirius]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user Kothardarastrix]], [[*user Ethagon]], and [[*user MasterTman2]][[/size]]
//But not my soul… no, my soul rests here. At Sirius. At sea.//
[[/div]]

+ ASSOCIATED STORIES

[[div class="filebox"]]
[[size 150%]] [[[starfish-blockade|Starfish Blockade]]][[/size]]
[[size 125%]] By [[*user Ethagon]][[/size]]
//To make the Starfish Blockade, oh the Starfish Blockade//
[[/div]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Further Reading]]

* [[[SCP-1000]]] - Bigfoot
* [[[excerpts-from-the-galileo-deep-space-observatory|Excerpts of Particular Interest From the Galileo Deep-Space Observatory Archives]]]
* [[[SCP-7820]]] - The Polar People
* [[[SCP-074]]] - Quantum Woodlouse

[[/tab]]
[[tab Characters]]
* **Isma:** Vanguard astroarchaeologist obsessed with //Moby-Dick// and the historical Captain Ahab.

* **Captain Ahab:** Ancient Fae captain of a whalerboat. Stern and runs a tight ship. Is willing to break a few rules to get ahead.

* **The White Whale:** The biggest of the Yeren's whaleships.

* **Stalu:** Ahab’s loyal first mate, deeply concerned for the fate of his captain and his ship.

* **Pile:** Teenage drug addict whose transcendental visions allow interstellar navigation; older and wiser than his years.

* **Fetatheuthis:** A spawn of the Voru. Bound by Ahab and its own curiosity.
[[/tab]]
[[tab What is this?]]
This series was published for the [[[pdcontest2025|Public Domain Contest 2025]]] which had to take one character of a Public Domain work and write a series about them. Our team chose Captain Ahab from Merville's Moby Dick.

The series itself follows the Ortothan Fae having fled from the Fae Empire to the moons of Uranus finding themselves eons later in a Space Race with the Yeren's Whaleships in the past, and Isma's attempts to uncover the story of Ahab and the white whale of that Space Race in the present.

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
